Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.1: Create environments that are healthy, respectful, supportive, and challenging for each child.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.2: Collaborate with professionals and partner with children’s families and communities.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.3: Use systematic observations, documentation, and other effective strategies in a responsible way, in partnership with families, staff and other professionals, to positively influence the development of each child.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.4: Teach in developmentally appropriate way, with sensitivity to children’s ages, characteristics, and the educational setting.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.5: Use positive relationships and supportive interactions as the foundation for their work with young children and families.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.6: Design, implement, and evaluate experiences that promote positive development and learning for each and every young child within diverse groups.
Child Development\/Early Childhood Educa.7: Identify and conduct themselves as members of the early childhood profession, respecting and abiding by the ethical and professional standards required.
